level.heading: TERMINATION DATE AND PROCESS FOR THE SUMMER PROGRAM (ยง 7-423)

level.text: Participants shall not be enrolled in program activities beyond September 30. However, in no event may a participant work, full time in YES after the beginning of his or her school year.
Allowable activities after September 30 under the funds appropriated for the previous year include the following:
Report and record preparation and submittal; and
Completion of evaluation and assessments of the summer program and audits.
